title: "Angry" distressed condensed sans
content:
I seriously need to know what font this is man...can't find the type anywhere! pls let me know if u can recognize it!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [angry.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202185622/http:/typophile.com/files/angry.jpg) | 31.21 KB |
author: fun_kay

comments.content: I'd say it's a sans typeface (Arial, Helvetica or other one) distorted with a vector software (Illustrator or Freedhand)
